name: Flor de Gonzalez (FDG) - Original Blend - Lonsdale
additionalNotes: Flor de Gonzalez (FDG) With a lineage dating back to Havana, Cuba, and now under the leadership of third generation owner Yadi Gonzalez, this company is producing a full line of top-quality cigars out of their factory in Nicaragua. The company offers a medium to fuller bodied roster of top-quality cigars that include the highly rated 90 Miles, along with other blends that offer excellence in flavor at an affordable price.
